ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Raid Guide
ygData.msgSnippet: The bit about people not listening is a big problem. Sometimes I think maybe people are trying to listen but miss things bc of spell messages. So maybe have
ygData.messageBody:
The bit about people not listening is a big problem. Sometimes I think maybe
people are trying to listen but miss things bc of spell messages. So maybe
have people turn off spell messages. And others hits. Or have those things
put in a seperate chat window and pushed out of the way. Other than that,
I'm not sure what to do.
luv,
-Su


>
> ********NEED HELP**********
> I need help from any of you High End gamers. My guild is quickly
growing, and starting to do Higher level raids. Many of our members have
not had much experience raiding, so we have been doing "training" raids. We
are still having people not listening, and ending up causing TPW's. If any
of you have any Guids to raiding, and/or rules that your guild has, please
send them to me so I can design something tailored to my guild.
> Any personal advice is welcomed also.
> OH, Barto, you should try Iceclad Ocean on Velious, and fight the
cougars. Kat went from 32-37 there fighting the cougars, with an added
bonus that a cougar claw earring may drop form a few of them =D
>
>
> Gwenevieve (soon to be Hartripper)
> 30 High Elf Cleric of Tunare
> Officer of Claws of Night
